column1: - Description : Farmer provieded field specific information about crop & input used in the experiment
- Source : Data Intensive Farm Management (DIFM) project
+ sq_rate : farmer's chosen rate of the input
+ min_rate : minimum rate of the trial input range
+ max_rate : maximum rate of the trial input range
- Usage : Track the field specific experimental information in data processing and anlaysis steps.
- Description : Nitrogen conversion factors for different nitrogen fertilizer types and unit
- Source : Data Intensive Farm Management (DIFM) project
- Dimensions : 4 types of nitrogen fertilizer and 3 units
+ conv_factor : conversion factor to calculate lbs uquivalent of N in the fertilizer
- Usage : Convert the nitrogen fertilizer to lbs of N for further analysis.
Description : Historical annual Producer Price Index (PPI) by commodity: farm products: Corn
- Source :  U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics & retrieved from Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis
- Citation : U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics
+ ppi : Producer Price Index by Commodity: Farm Products: Corn (WPU01220205)
- Usage : To adjust the corn price for inflation in the analysis.
Description : Annual corn price received by farmers in the U.S. (national
+ value : corn price received by farmers
- Usage : To calculate the EONR and associated profit
Description : Annual N-equivalent nitrogen price (per lbs) annually reported
- Source :  USDA Economic Research Service / DTN Progressive Farmer
- Usage : To calculate the EONR and associated profit
